Description:
[Regression]NPE throws out when open a older release product dataset 07]

Build number: 
2.2.0.v20070515-0630

Steps to reproduce:
1, Open the attached report design
2, Choose one dataset and double click
3, Click OK button to update the dataset

Expected result:
The dataset update successfully without exceptions

Actual result:
NPE throws out
